description: If n = Product (p_j^k_j) then a(n) = Sum partition(k_j).
comments: a(n) is a function of the prime signature of n (cf. A025487). - _Matthew Vandermast_, Jun 24 2012
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: Prepend[ Array[ Plus @@ (PartitionsP /@ Last[ Transpose[ FactorInteger[ # ] ] ])&, 100, 2 ], 1 ]
